title: Looking for an ADC , Im a support main.
body:
I'm a support main, however due to very unfortunate team mates, I am bronze 2. I am wanting to climb however I haven't been getting the best attack damage carries. For example one of my last ones rushed a last whisper... 
You can check my K/D/A Online for ranked Janna etc. Will give you an idea of how I play.
Thanks and please let me know.

replies.body: Heyo, I am currently Bronze 3, (I blame my team mates as well :P) I main ADC and Top, and I play champions like JInx, Tristana and Ashe. I like to farm up in lane and play passively, going for that late game damage. I've been playing since Season 2 and am quite experienced. Tell me if you're interested :P

Hello, I'm in Silver 3 and with a decent ability to play ADC (It's my 3rd role, but I am becoming more proficient at it).
If you can play a good, passive Janna I think we might have some success. I normally play ADCs that like scaling into lategame, like Ashe, Tristana and Ezreal, but am increasing my ADC pool as time goes on.

Hello I currently got back into playing ranked from 5 months. I also have dropped in the ladder and is now Bronze 4 because also I get the occasional trolls and afks. Recently today I got a Teemo that went adc and grabbed clairvoyance  and clarity. I am decent with most of the ADCS but my personal favourite is Jinx, lucian and Sivir. I am buying Tristana next and have played Graves for the free to play champs for the week and I must say I am decent at him.

You can say no to me, I am not forcing you to play with me at all. Thank You.

GalaKnight
